Text.Name: Wheat
Text.Desc: Main source of food. Despite a long growth period, it is resilient and can grow in a temperature between [temperature]0[/temperature]-[temperature]40[/temperature], and grants a hefty yield to boot.

Text.Name: Healroot
Text.Desc: The most common and basic medicine. Can be processed and refined into other kinds of medicine. Can only grow in a temperature between [temperature]10[/temperature]-[temperature]40[/temperature].

Text.Name: Cotton
Text.Desc: Main source for the manufacture of fabrics. Suitable to grow in a temperature between [temperature]5[/temperature]-[temperature]35[/temperature]. Can also be obtained during an adventure to Mt. Barren.

Text.Name: Mushroom
Text.Desc: Common mushroom. Often grows in an environment of [temperature]18[/temperature]-[temperature]23[/temperature], and can only grow in the dark.
